content.text: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer" )

content.text: 3 teaspoons thinly sliced fresh ginger root
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "3 teaspoons thinly sliced fresh ginger root" )
( ing-7 "3 teaspoons coarsely ground black pepper" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, mix barbeque sauce, teriyaki sauce, beer, garlic, ginger, onion, black pepper, and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "barbeque sauce"@24:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "teriyaki sauce"@40:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "beer"@56:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "garlic"@62:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "ginger"@70:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "onion"@78:83 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "black pepper"@85:97 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "salt"@103:107 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Place the roast into the marinade, cover and refrigerate for six hours, turning often.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the roast"@9:18 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the marinade"@24:36 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "cover"@38:43 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-2 "refrigerate"@48:59 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "six hours"@64:73 / DUR )
		:simultaneous ( ac-1-3 "turning"@75:82 / AC )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Preheat an outdoor grill for indirect heat.
3) Remove the roast from the marinade, and pour the marinade into a saucepan.
4) Bring to a boil, and cook for 5 minutes.
5) Set aside for use as a basting sauce.
6) Thread the roast onto a rotating barbecue spit above indirect heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Thread"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "the roast"@10:19 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a rotating barbecue spit"@25:49 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "indirect heat"@56:69 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Cook the roast for two hours, or until the internal temperature of the roast is at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "the roast"@8:17 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "two hours"@22:31 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until the internal temperature of the roast is at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C)"@36:120 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Baste often during the last hour with reserved marinade.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Baste"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "reserved marinade"@41:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( dur-8-0 "the last hour"@22:35 / DUR )
)
